attributes.action: People who already have a refugee status
attributes.background:
The speech of Home Secretary put many people in stress ..where she mentioned people refugee going to get ilr in 20 years.
Its totally unfair unjustified 
Many refugee see UK as a new home and working hard to build their future in this country.
New rule for new applicants not the existing !

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:

Keep the 5-Year ILR route for refugees. Do not extend it to 10 or 20 years
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/751443
